issue.title: [CF 926] Error Codes
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

1. I see nothing, it´s don´t going.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
That this going ^^

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
I using 6.2.6

Do you have an error log of what happened?

TellMeWhen: Warning! Group 2, 5 Icon checks an invalid symbol (group 5, symbol 2)
TellMeWhen: Warning! Group 2, Icon 1 checks an invalid symbol (group 6, symbol 1)
TellMeWhen: Warning! Group 1, Icon 3 checks an invalid symbol (Group 5 icon 5)
TellMeWhen: Warning! Group 1, 5 Icon checks an invalid symbol (group 6, Symbol 4)
TellMeWhen: Warning! Group 1 Icon 1 checks an invalid symbol (group 6, symbol 3)
TellMeWhen: Warning! Group 1 Icon 1 checks an invalid symbol (group 5, icon 3)

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

Hey,

i have a problem. I have put a string in tmw, but i become the error code that i post over that.
I don´t know why. I see nothing from tmw, not a single icon or anything. Ingame i see this:
http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/wowscrnshot0206941a3wjrz.jpg

this is the string that i putted in: http://pastebin.com/7dJAKt66

hope you can help me.


> Posted by CurseForge user MaRceeLBlacK | Imported from CurseForge issue #926 | Raw

comments.body:
Please see my above comment

Disclaimer: I'm not at a computer that I can log into WoW on right, now, so I am only going off what i can deduce from the export string you have linked me. I will get a closer look at what is going on here when I get home.

It appears to me that you imported the groups from this profile individually and in an order that is not consistent with the order that they were in in the profile that you imported. When importing a profile, you should always choose the option to import the whole thing all at once instead of importing the groups one by one, as this can cause the links between icons to become broken when importing icons, groups, or profiles that were exported by someone who is using a pre-v7.0.0 version of TellMeWhen. TellMeWhen v7.0.0, which is currently in alpha, has mechanisms to prevent these links from being broken when importing icons and groups individually, but it requires that the source string and the client that is importing the string both be running this version, and this is not the case here.

Again, I apologize if this is not what has happened here, as I have not yet had a chance to investigate what is happening here first-hand - I am only guessing off what I can tell from this ticket without logging into WoW. I will try to respond back to you with more information later tonight.

Edited Feb 12, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Sorry about that - my original comment was not correct about the cause of the issue. What is happening here is simply that you have meta icons that are trying to check other icons that don't exist (in certain specs), which is exactly what these warnings are there to warn you about. They aren't errors - just warnings that something might be happening that you didn't intend. In this case, there is nothing wrong with this setup, so you can safely disable the warnings.

You can disable these warnings by disabling the "Warn about invalid icons" option in TMW's main options.

Edited Feb 12, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Marking ticket as invalid since there is no error here.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

The errrors are me not interesting too, when it going ^^ but it isn´t going. In the Fight i´m see nothing from tmw, no 1 Icon, nothing. So i don´t know why. the string most be going, because by other people it´s going too. But i don´t understand because i see nothing.

Edited Feb 12, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user MaRceeLBlacK

Oh, sorry, I totally missed that part of your ticket! I will check it out again later today; I'll test it with a warrior and the PTR and see what is going on.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Ok, it wold be very nice. Thanks for all.


> Posted by CurseForge user MaRceeLBlacK

I'm not sure what the issue is that you are experiencing because this profile is working exactly as intended for me. When I use Shield Wall in prot spec, the icon appears to show the duration of my shield wall. When I use colossus smash on my target as fury, an icon appears to show the duration of the debuff on my target. Are you not able to see this behavior when you use your abilities?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

nope, i see nothing :( i don´t know why. I have uninstall tmw and put it in, but i don´t know why this don´t going.


> Posted by CurseForge user MaRceeLBlacK

I have the problem. I´m a german people, and this is for english. So when i´m change the Language to english, its going. iBut when i change to german, it´s don´t gong. What i most do, that it´s going with german?


> Posted by CurseForge user MaRceeLBlacK

Oh, sorry, I should have noticed that in the screenshot. You need to change all the spell names of all the spells that the icons are tracking to their German names, or change the spell names to spellIDs (which don't depend on locale).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Have tried it, but it don´t going. Can you do it for me?


> Posted by CurseForge user MaRceeLBlacK

No, I'm not bilingual.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I have done it yet ... Have looked at wowhead andsoon. Thanks a lot or all.


> Posted by CurseForge user MaRceeLBlacK
